Yaja' xin xato nahul heyu yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios jet yul Yum han̈on̈ con̈yuninal, bay chala: C'ahol, machojab chiscaj hawi' yet chachiscuyni Comam Dios Jahawil. Machojab xin chaẍmeltzo tawintaj yet chaẍiscachni Comam.

Yijewe yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj chiijbali texol, watx'ewe tzet chal ebnaj yuto ha' ebnaj chexiptzeni, yeb xin ha' ebnaj chihalni tet Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chewatx'e. Yuxin aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal, haxinwal yin̈ tzalahilal chitak'wi ebnaj teyin̈ tet Comam, mach yin̈o bisc'ulal, ta mach xin mach chechah isc'ulal.
Lahwi tu' xin, istan̈tzenilo Comam hujeb nimeta con̈ob bey tx'otx' Cana'an, yak'ni Comam istx'otx' ebnaj tet ebnaj jichmam tu'.
Tato ay anma nan cuybanile chiyalic'oj, mach lahano yeb cuybanile yet Comam Jesucristo caw yel chala, yeb mach lahano yeb hune' caw tohol ak'bil cocuyu',
Tato ay hunu mac chiapni tec'atan̈, nan xin cuybanile ik'bil yu, mach chechah yul heyatut, yeb xin mach chek'ambe hanic' ye isc'ul.
Yuto haca'tic'a chu islahnico jak'len nimeta isya'tajil yin̈ Comam Cristo, hactic'apax tu' chu islahnico Comam yak'ni yak'lobal janma.

Caw c'anch'ancano huntek'an ebnaj tu', yuto lahan tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj haca' tzet iswatx'e naj Ca'in. Chiswatx'epaxo ebnaj haca' tzet yute naj Balaam, yu ch'en melyu iswatx'e naj istx'ojal. Chiswatx'epaxo ebnaj haca' iswatx'e naj Cor'e, cam naj yu mach isyije naj tzet yal Comam Dios; hac tu' xin chu istan̈tzelaxilo ebnaj ti' yu isman̈c'omal.

Wal ebnaj chiwalti'an, ton̈etic'a chibuchwa ebnaj yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' mach yohtajoj. Lahan isnabal ebnaj haca' no nok', ha' tzet yohta ebnaj mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj, ton̈etic'a chiswatx'e ebnaj tzet choche isc'ul. Ha' huntek'an tu' chi'etanto yanma ebnaj sata Comam Dios, cat ischahni ebnaj isya'tajil.

Yu yayto naj No'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin hayet yalni Comam ta chak' hune' niman yaxn̈ab isyijen naj tzet yal Comam, yoc naj iswatx'eno hune' barco bay chicolcha naj yeb yixal yeb oxwan̈ isc'ahol yeb ebix alibe, waxan̈ca xin maẍto ixtan̈o hune' n̈ab tu'. Yu yayto naj No'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin colcha naj, wal anma xin tan̈ilo sunil. Iscancano naj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, yu yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam.
Hac ton tu' ye iswatx'ebanil yatut Comam Dios tu'. Yul hune' babel cuarto hunun tz'ayic yocto ebnaj sacerdote isyijeno ismunil tet Comam.

Yalnipaxo naj Esteban tet ebnaj tu': --Walex hex ti', caw hip yecanilo heyanma haca' yanma anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios. Caw ay hetxiquin yaj mach cheyabe tzet chal Comam. Ton̈etic'a cheman̈c'o tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu Santo, yuxin caw lahanex yeb heyichmam tu'.

Txumweloj tato mach ak'lax chejbanile yu naj Mois'es yu iscachwa yin̈ anma c'ul chute isba; walxinto yu iscachwa yin̈ anma man̈c'om yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios, yeb mach caw yijemoj, yeb huntek'an machi Dios yul sat, caw mulumpaxoj, huntek'an anma machiswalil yanma, huntek'an chiyahni sunil tzet chitit bay ay Comam Dios, huntek'an chipotx'ni ismam maca ismi', yeb sunil huntek'an anma mak'om.
Yin̈ hune' incartahan watojan teyet waltojan tato mach chu hehunban heba yeb mac chito ixli maca chito winajli.
Ha' tzet chinwatx'ehan mach c'ulo chiwilan, yuto ha' isc'ulal chiwochehan inwatx'ehan mach chinwatx'epaxojan. Wal xin ha' huntek'an tzet yahbil wuhan ha' chinwatx'epaxojan.

Wal xin cam ohtan̈ewelo Comam Jesucristo, Cocolomal. Ipojab xin hech'ib yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam hunun tz'ayic. Yuxin caw nimanojab yelapno ye Comam Cocolomal yul hesat tinan̈, yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanon̈ti'an̈ chon̈hallaxan̈ sucal yu chijalic'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo. Walex hex ti' xin caw helanex yin̈ Comam Jesucristo heyalni. Han̈on̈ti'an̈ caw machi jipan̈, walex xin caw aycano heyip. Caw matzet jelapnojan̈ yul hesat, walex xin caw aycano heyelapnoj.
Pahweto naj, lin̈bawe heba yin̈ Comam. Heyohtaj tato ha' ebnaj heyuẍta yin̈ Comam pujanto sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', lahan yilni ebnaj isya'tajil haca' hex tu'.

Haxa hex camte' hex, yijewe yin̈ sunil tzet chal heyahawil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Machojabn̈etaj yet t'an̈anico ebnaj teyin̈ sak'al hemunlahi, yun̈e caw c'ul cheyucano yul sat ebnaj. Wal xin sunilojab heyanma chexmunlahi, xiwan̈wej yuto caw chil Comam Jesucristo tzet chewatx'e.
Haxa lahon̈eb yuc'a' no' hawil tu', yechel yin̈ lahon̈wan̈ ebnaj rey maẍto chioc yahawiloj, yaj xin hun chu yak'lax yip ebnaj yeb naj Nok' isbi yoc yahawil yin̈ hanic' tiempohal.
Walon̈ ti' xin maẍtaj yesp'iritu yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chabil ju, to ha' hune' Esp'iritu chitit yin̈ Comam Dios. Hac tu' xin chu cotxumni huntek'an isc'ulal chak' Comam jet.
Hex k'alom hex ti', abewecanoj. ¡Ok'an̈we yin̈ caw ip teyin̈ yuto lan̈an yul istiempohal bay ch'ec'oya' heyanma!

Mach chexxiw yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil chul teyiban̈. Ayex ti' chexalaxoco preso yu naj matzwalil yun̈e heyilwelaxi. Yulbal lahon̈eb tz'ayic cheyil isya'tajil, wal xin caw lin̈bawe heba waxan̈ca chexak'lax camoj, hac tu' xin chiwak'an k'inale mach istan̈bal ispaj selelo teyet haca' hunu corona.

Wal hach ti' wuẍta Timoteo, yet Comam Dios hawehi. Elan̈ tet huntek'an istx'ojal tu', ha' isc'ulal chasayiloj. K'an yip hawanma tet Comam Dios. Tohol chawute habelwi yin̈ Comam yin̈ sat anma. Xahan chawil hawet anmahil, ijle isya'tajil chi'ay tawiban̈. Chewojab chawute haba.
Hex k'alomex ti', caw xaheyak' yoche heyanma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yin̈ sunil tzet cheyoche, yuxin caw bak'ichexxa. Haca' no' wacax caw bak'ich, lan̈anxa yapni istiempohal ispotx'laxi.

Wilnipaxojan veinticuatro tz'on̈obal yin̈la ishoyanil istz'on̈obal Comam, yul huntek'an tz'on̈obal tu' tz'on̈anayo veinticuatro ebnaj anciano, saj xil isk'ap ayco yeb ayahto corona naba oro yin̈ iswi' ebnaj.

Haca'tic'a yu islolo'n̈en isba yeb yak'ni tzet choche yanma, hac tu' chu heyak'ni ec'oya' yanma cat heyak'ni isya'tajil tet, yuto chal hune' con̈ob Babilonia tu' haca' ti': "Haninti'an caw reinainan, tz'on̈aninan yul intz'on̈obalan, man hunixojan, mach bak'inal chiec'ya' wanmahan," ẍi ix.

Haquexpax tu' hex ichamile hex ti', c'ul cheyute heyanma yin̈ heyixal. Ohtan̈eweloj ta lahan ebix haca' hunu vaso nab ispohi. Ayojab yelapno ye ebix yul hesat yuto lahan cok'inal chicochah tet Comam yeb ebix. Yuxin c'ul cheyute heba yin̈ ebix yun̈e matzet ch'oc hexolbal yet chexoc txahlo tet Comam.
Mach chisje inc'ulan tato chicuywa ebix ix xol ebnaj winaj, maca xin chipalc'onpaxo ebix yiban̈ ebnaj. Wal xin ton̈ehojab chishajba istxiquin ebix yin̈ tzet chihallaxi yet ch'ak'lax cuybanile.
Sunil tzet chalte Comam Dios masan caw chij isba, ha' xin Comam quexawtenico yul isk'ab Isc'ahol, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, caw awtebilex yu hecollaxcanoj, yaja' maẍtaj yu hewatx'en sunil ismachiswalilal choche isc'ul henimanil. Ha' wal heyuten heba to cheyak'le cheja' heba teyet hununex, yun̈e heyeniloj tato caw xahan cheyil heba.
Yuxin nann̈e heyu yin̈ tzet cheyala', yeb yin̈ tzet chewatx'e, yuto yilal yixtan̈witi yu hune' ley yet Comam Jesucristo. Hune' ley xacon̈bejtzonico yin̈ cowatx'en tzet choche Comam Dios.
Caw nananta comunil hununon̈, yaja' hune'n̈e mac bay chon̈munla cosunil, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo.

Titna anma wet con̈obtu'an yin̈ ebnaj jichmam sic'bililo yu Comam Dios, istitpaxo Comam Cristo yin̈ ebnaj jichmam tu' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Ha' Comam tu' Yahaw yeco yiban̈ sunil tzettaj ye tu', yuxin jak'aweco ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Hacojab tu'.

Ta chiec'ya' janmahan̈ yaj yu hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma yeb yun̈e hecolchahi. Ta chak' Comam Dios yak'lobal janmahan̈ yun̈e hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma hex ti', hac tu' xin ay heyip heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil chul teyiban̈ haca' huntek'an isya'tajil chijak'leti'an̈.
Ha' xin Comam Dios con̈sic'nicaniloj, con̈yanico yin̈ ist'in̈anil, jetbin̈encano coba yeb Comam Jesucristo.
Yuxin yal hune' yul nuk'e tu' hunelxa tet naj: --Sunil tzet sajxa ye yu Dios, mach chawal tz'ilal, ẍi.

Wal sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yaco ebnaj ismul yeb yak' yoche tzet chal isnimanil yeb hune' con̈ob tu', caw ch'ok' ebnaj yeb caw chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yilni yah isn̈ubal yet chitz'atoj.
Yalni Comam xin: --Ha' mac chinochenan, chisyije tzet chiwalan, caw xin xahan ch'illaxo yu Inmaman. Hac tu' xin chu julan̈ cat joccanojan̈ yetbihoj.

Ha' xin chiyenilo tzet caw yu con̈yochen Comam Dios. Wal xin, caw maẍtajon̈ babel coyelo jochen Comam Dios, to ha' Comam con̈ochen babel, yuxin yati Comam Isc'ahol yak'ni isba yin̈ xahanbalil, yak'nicano tan̈o comul.

Comam Dios issajilk'inal yehi, yuxinto yin̈ issajilk'inal Comam Dios tu' chon̈belwi, caw jetbixa coba hununon̈. Ha' xin ischiq'uil Comam Jes'us, Isc'ahol Comam Dios, ha' chon̈sajn̈en yin̈ sunil comul.
Wal tinan̈ xin, matxa chejabo jehi, to caw yuninalxa Comam jehi. Yu hune' tu' xin, caw el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios yak'ni hune' comatan, yaj yu Comam Jesucristo, Isc'ahol Comam tu'.
Walpaxo yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam tu' chala: Hach Dios, yahaw hach yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Ha' istoholal xin chawatx'e yet ayachico Yahawiloj.

Istak'wi ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel tu': --Mach chaẍcok'ojcan̈an̈ yu hunu isc'ulal chawatx'e, wal xin yu chachbuchwa yin̈ Comam Dios, yuto hach ti' caw comon anma hach, yaj chawalico haba Diosal, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.

Hune' bay chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma ebnaj tu' ayn̈etic'aco yah isn̈ubal yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Tz'ayic, ak'bal machi nino xewilal chiak'lax tet macta chiyo isba tet naj Nok' isbi tu' yeb chiyo isba tet yechel naj, yeb chichahni yechel isbi naj yin̈ ispalan̈ maca yin̈ isk'ab, ẍi naj.
Mach chicabcon coc'ulan̈ yuto yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yuxin yaco Comam hune' munil ti' yul cok'aban̈.
Yuxin sunil janma chijalni haca' ti': Ha' Comam Dios Jahawil chicolwa win̈an, yuxin mach chinxiwan yin̈ istx'ojal choche anma iswatx'e win̈an, con̈chi.

Wal xin ha' mac chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' machojab chisyah mac mach chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu'. Haxa mac mach chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu', machojab chal isk'umal mac chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu', yuto ha' hune' mac tu' chabilxa Comam yu.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios, Comam chiak'ni isnimanil coc'ul yeb yak'lobal janma chicolwa teyin̈, haxinwal hunxan̈e tzet chiec' yin̈ henabal haca' Comam Jesucristo.

Mach lahano Comam haca' ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote, titna yin̈ yuninal naj Lev'i yuto ebnaj tu' hunun tz'ayic yalten ebnaj no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil. Yin̈ babelal chak' ebnaj isxahanbal yin̈ ismul, lahwi tu' cat yalten ebnaj xahanbal yin̈ ismul anma. Wal Comam Jes'us hunelch'an yaco isba Comam xahanbalil yu comul.
Yaja' k'inalo ta ay hunu mac ay tzet aya, ton̈e xin chil yec' yuẍta yin̈ man̈tzetal, machi xin chicolwa yin̈, chal yelapnoj tato caw machi isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios yul yanma.
Yuxin caw ayco Comam Dios yipo janma, jochebal chicobejcano hune' conimanil ti' cat japni isc'atan̈ Comam.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuti'an, han̈on̈ ti' mach cocon̈obo hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ton̈e chon̈eq'ui; yuxin chintak'ecantojan teyet, mach chebeybaln̈e huntek'an tzet chiyoche henimanil, yuto ha' huntek'an istx'ojal tu' chiyak'le howal yeb janma.
Xiwan̈we tet Comam Dios, cat xin hexahann̈enpaxo anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam. Ayojab yelapno ye heyet anmahil yul hesat, yebpaxo naj jahaw, ayojab yelapno ye naj yul hesat.
Ha' yute isnani naj Mois'es tu' to txumchalo yu ebnaj jet con̈ob tu' tato ha' Comam Dios an̈eco naj yun̈e iscolnilo naj ebnaj yul isk'ab isya'tajil, yaj maẍtic'a txumchapaxilo yu ebnaj.
Caw nann̈e heyu tet ebnaj caw lahlonn̈etic'a yec' haca' metx tx'i', han̈c'an̈etic'a ismachiswalilal chiswatx'e, cat yalni ta caw yilal chioc hune' circuncisi'on yin̈ conimanil.

Chal ebnaj tato yohta ebnaj Comam Dios, yaja' tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj chiyeniloj tato mach yohtajo ebnaj Comam. Ton̈etic'a chichiwa isc'ul ebnaj, mach chisyijepaxo ebnaj tzet chal Comam. Machi hunu tzet ye tu' c'ul chiswatx'e ebnaj.
Haninti'an chiwaco inbahan yin̈ walnihan tato caw yijem ebnaj tet Comam, cachann̈e xin mach haca'o yalni isyelal cuybanile.
Haca'ojab yak'ni Comam yak'lobal janma yin̈ ej isya'tajil chul jiban̈, hacojab tu' chu jak'ni yak'lobal yanma macta chiak'len isya'tajil yu isc'ulch'anil Comam yak' jet.
Caw hantatic'a chu hawu lahico hawec' yin̈ isc'ulal, haxinwal chitzala Comam Dios tawin̈, haca' hunu munlawom matzet yin̈ wal istx'ixwican̈, hune' mac ha' cuybanile caw yel chalic'oj.

Ha' ton hune' naj tu' chiyican̈ isba cat yoc naj howal yin̈ huntek'an chihallax diosal, maca huntek'an bay chiyiyo isba anma. Chanic'to isba naj yul yatut Comam Dios cat yalni naj tato ha' naj caw dioscanoj.
Walpaxo hex mame mi'e hex ti', caw mach cheyak'tij ishowal heyuninal, ha' heyet to caw c'ul chu hecuyni yeb hecachni, haxinwal chixiw tet Comam Dios.
Yaja' waxan̈ca chihul huntek'an isya'tajil tu' jiban̈, chon̈k'oji yin̈ yu iscolwal Comam xahan chon̈ilni.

Hac tu' xin caw cosunilan̈ con̈ayc'ayan̈ sat tx'otx'. Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e halni wetan yul abxubal hebreo haca' ti': "Saulo, Saulo, ¿tzet yin̈ yuxin chinhatzumbec'ojan? Hach caw ach, chawak' lahwo haba haca' hunu no' wacax chixan̈wa yin̈ hunu te te' k'ak'i' iswi'," ẍi wetan.

Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzet chewatx'e. Wohtajan hanta ch'ec'ya' heyanma yeb hemeba'il, yaja' yin̈ caw yeli yul sat Comam Dios caw k'alomex. Caw wohtajan tato tx'oj istzotel ebnaj chal isba Israelal teyin̈, yaja' huntek'an ebnaj tu' yet naj matzwalil ye ebnaj.
Mach chon̈tzala yin̈ istx'ojal chiswatx'e hunu jet anmahil, walxinto ha' yin̈ isc'ulal chiswatx'e yin̈ chon̈tzalahi.

Yuxin bejwecano sunil istx'ojal yeb sunil ismachiswalilal caw chipoh yul yiban̈k'inal ti'. C'ulch'anojab chu hechahni Istzoti' Comam Dios challax teyet, hune' tz'unbilxa yul heyanma yu Comam, yuto ha' chexcolni tet sunil istx'ojal.

Yet wec'an texol haca'tan̈e haninan intz'uncanayojan hunu te te' texol. Haxa yet yec' naj Apolos texol xin haca'tan̈e ha' naj ec' hayenoj. Yaja' yin̈ caw yeli, ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni ch'ibo hune' tz'unub tu'.

Tzujan hune'xa naj 'angel yinta naj babel tu', yalni naj iscab tu': Wal tinan̈ maayc'ay niman con̈ob Babilonia, yuto ha' oc uc'tzenocan̈ sunilej con̈ob yu istx'ojal iswi' yin̈ ixloj yeb yin̈ winajloj, ẍi naj.
Tato cheyije tzet chiwalti'an, caw wamigohan heyehi.
Hex xahan ay wuti'an, caw nann̈e heyu, mach chexoc tzujno yinta tioẍ yeb sunil huntek'an bay chiay jahno anma. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Yuto xol ebnaj chiwalti'an, ay ebnaj chiocto yul n̈a, cat yoc ebnaj ismonten ebix ix yun̈e issomchato iswi', yuto machi yip isnabal ebix yu nohna yanma ebix yu istx'ojal, chisyijento ebix tzet choche isc'ul.

Walxinto ha' isyelal wal jalni, yaja' yin̈ isc'ulch'anil coc'ul. Hac tu' xin chu coch'ib yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo, haxinwal lahanxan̈e chon̈elico yin̈ Comam, yuto ha' Comam caw iswi'ehal yeco jin̈, yuto han̈on̈ ti' isnimanil Comam jehi.
Hunxan̈ehojab cheyute heba yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo, yuto ha' Comam quexhunbancanoj, yanicanico ak'anc'ulal texol.

Isk'amben naj: --Mamin, ¿mac anmahil hach? ẍi naj Saulo tu'. Istak'wi hune' yul nuk'e tu' tet naj: --Haninti'an Jes'us inan, caw ayachico quinhatzumbenic'ojan, yaj ton̈e chawak' lahwo haba haca' chu islahwi hunu no' wacax chixan̈wa yin̈ hunu te te' k'ak'i' iswi', ẍi hune' tu'.

Wal xin ak'awe tzalaho heyanma yin̈ Comam Cristo Jahawil. Ayojab yelapno Comam yul hesat. Helan cheyute heba hetak'wi tet mac chik'amben teyet yin̈ cuybanile bay ayco heyanma. Chewchotan̈eojab chu heyalni tet anma tu' yeb yin̈ ak'anc'ulal.
Yalni Comam Dios tet naj: --Ilo haxan̈ab yin̈ hawoj, yuto hune' bay ayayo hawoj ti' caw txahul, yuto ha' bey ti' lan̈an intzotelan tawet.

Ha' hune' cuybanile ti' jabe yettax janico coba yul isk'ab Comam Dios, caw xin yilal wal yeco yul janma. Tato caw wal yeco hune' cuybanile tu' yul janma, wal tu' huneln̈e jeco yin̈ Comam Dios, yebpaxo yul isk'ab Isc'ahol.
Yin̈ caw isyela chiwalan teyet, macn̈etic'a chiyijen tzet chiwalti'an, machi bak'inal chicami, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Lahwi tu', wilnihan hune' niman tz'on̈obal saj jilni yeb hune' mac tz'on̈anayo yul hune' tz'on̈obal tu'. Yin̈n̈ena tu' isc'aycan̈ tx'o tx'otx' yeb satcan̈ sata mac tz'on̈an tu', wiyom xin isc'aycaniloj.

Aypaxo mac chalni haca' ti': "Ha' tzet chicolo yet coc'ul yehi, ha' coc'ul tu' xin yet tzet chicolo yehi," ẍi. Yeli hac ton tu' yehi, yaja' tzet chicolo tu' yeb coc'ul tu' chiapni istz'ayical bay chitan̈ilo yu Comam Dios. Wal conimanil xin mach yeto ixloj maca winajlo yehi. Walxinto yetxa Comam Jesucristo Jahawil ye conimanil ti', yetxapaxo conimanil ye Comam.
Hacon̈ojab tu' conabawetij tato camnajon̈xa yin̈ mule, yaja' itzitzon̈xa yu coyijen tet Comam Dios, yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.

Jak'a' yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yuto yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin sunilbal tiempo chon̈k'oji. Han̈on̈ xin chon̈isk'an Comam yu jak'ni ohtan̈elaxo Istzoti' tet anma. Ha' hune' Tzoti' tu' caw sunil bay chipujnatoj, haca' yec' isxuk'al sam hunu tzet ye tu' caw xuk' sam.
Wal tinan̈ xin, chijaltojan̈ teyet yin̈ cuybanile yalcano Comam Jesucristo jetan̈. Yal Comam Jes'us tato Comam Dios caw issajilk'inal yehi, machi nich'ano k'ejholo yin̈.
Wal xin, sunil mac chahti Inmaman wetan, chul yul ink'aban, yuxin mac chihul yul ink'abtu'an caw chinchahan, mach chinman̈c'otojan.
Machojab chebej hexahann̈en heba hununex, yuto heyuẍtaxa heba yin̈ Comam, hacpax tu' ebix ix xachahni Comam heyanabxapaxo ebix.
Yuxin ch'ak' Comam colbanile mach istan̈bal tet macta chihitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yu Comam Jes'us. Ha' Comam xin chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yu mach chicam Comam.

Yahpaxo wejna ebnaj yalni yin̈ caw ip: --¡Camojab naj, camojab naj, acan̈ naj yin̈ culus! ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam. Istak'wipaxo naj: --¿Tom chiwacan̈an naj heyahawil ti' yin̈ culus, chal tu'? ẍi naj tet ebnaj. Istak'wi ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote: --Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈, mach hunuxa jahawilan̈ cachann̈e naj jahawil ay bey Roma, ẍi ebnaj tet naj.
Hacpax tu' tinan̈, ay haywan̈ ebnaj sic'bililo yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios.
Sunil ebnaj yahawil con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', xaayc'ay yin̈ mule yeb ix, haxa anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xin, haca'tan̈e xayuc'tzecan̈ ix yin̈ mule yu istx'ojal iswi', ẍi naj.
Xahanojab cheyil heba hununex, yuto yuninalxa Comam Dios heyehi, ec'balojab yelapno ye ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yul hesat.
Sunil mac ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiijbani, ha' huntek'an mac tu' yuninal Comam Dios yehi.
Isyenipaxocan̈ isba hune'xa yechel yul satcan̈, wilnihan hune' mac haca' no' nimeta drag'on cajin̈, hujeb iswi' yeb xin lahon̈eb yuc'a', ayahto xin corona yin̈ hunun iswi' no'.

Yu yuninalon̈xa Comam Dios yuxin chicochah comajul tet Comam. Hune' comajul tu' hun chu cochahni yeb Comam Jesucristo tato ha' hunon̈ chijak'le isya'tajil yinta Comam; ta hac tu' hun chu cochahni isc'ulal yeb Comam.

Ha' ebnaj anciano c'ul yijbali yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj, yilal niman yelapno ebnaj yul sat ebnaj juẍtaj sunil. Hactic'apax tu' ebnaj anciano chipujbanic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios, yebpaxo ebnaj chicuywa yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yilal ischahni ebnaj istohol, yeb nimanojab yelapno ye ebnaj yul sat ebnaj juẍtaj.

Yaja' mach sunilo ebnaj juẍta chinachalo hune' ti' yu. Yuto ay ebnaj chi-tic'a-yiyo isba tet tioẍ yet yalan̈tocanoj, yuxin yet chisc'uxni ebnaj no' chibe haltebilxa yin̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ tu', chito cabcon isc'ul, chistxumni ebnaj ta ch'etaxto ebnaj yu.

K'inaloj tato ayej te' isk'ab mach chisatni, chitzoc'laxilto te' yu naj chitan̈en te'. Wal te' isk'ab caw c'ul issatni xin, chiyilo naj istajinal isk'ab te', hac tu' xin caw chisatni te' sic'lebil. Haca' iswatx'encan̈ naj te' uva tu', caw hac tu' chiyute istan̈en Inmaman macta ayxaco yul ink'aban.
Mach yahawo cheyute heba yin̈ macta chi'ak'lax hetan̈e. Wal xin yewe c'ulla beybale tet, haxinwal caw c'ul chutepaxo isbeybal.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chijochehan̈ tato cheyohtan̈elo tzet chiyak'le anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam xalecamtoj, haxinwal mach cheyik' bisc'ulal, haca' anma machi bay chicawxi isc'ul.

Yu yayto ebnaj Israel yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin ispoh isba ha' mar Rojo, yec'to ebnaj yictabal ha', caw xin tajin bay ec'to ebnaj. Haxa yet yec'to ebnaj Egipto yalni, ishunban isba ha', ishik'nito ebnaj ha', iscamilo ebnaj.
Yulbal hune' tiempohal tu' xin, pitzc'a naj Mois'es. Caw c'ulch'ancano hune' naj nich'an tu' yul sat Comam Dios. Yulbal oxeb ixahaw ak'lax ch'ibo naj yu ismi' yeb yu ismam.
Ebnaj yahawil sacerdote tu' lahan ebnaj yeb yet anmahil chihoyxipaxico ilwebal yin̈ ebnaj, yuxin chu istz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ macta machi isnabal yeb yin̈ macta c'aynatoj.

Tinan̈ xin cawilxa yeti tiempo, lahan haca' yet xaec'to ak'bal, lan̈anxa issajbiloj. Yuxin cobeja'wecano sunil istx'ojal yet k'ejholo, cat cowatx'en coba jec' yin̈ issajilk'inal yet Comam, haca' chu iswatx'en isba naj soldado, yet chanic'o naj huntek'an xilk'ape yet howal.

Haxa hex yahaw munil hex xin, hactic'apax tu' cheyutepaxo heba yin̈ ebnaj hec'amte'. Caw mach howo cheyute heba yin̈ ebnaj, yuto caw lahan heyehico yalan̈ yip Comam Dios Jahawil ay satcan̈. Wal xin caw machi hunu mac ec'bal yelapno ye yiban̈ hunuxa mac yul sat Comam.
Ak'we tzalaho hec'ul yinta mac tzalahilal yehi, yeb xin ocan̈we yin̈ bisc'ulal yinta mac bisc'ulal yehi.

Yaja' yu iscawil heyanma yeb yu mach cheje heyak'aco heba yul isk'ab Comam Dios, cat hebejnicano istx'ojal, yu hune' tu' xin lan̈an hecutxbanico ishowal Comam Dios teyiban̈ yin̈ hune' istz'ayical isya'tajil, yet chilni Comam yin̈ caw isyelal yin̈ tzet chielico anma.

Yaj wal xin ay huntek'an ebnaj Israel ay yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia yeb con̈ob Iconio apni yul con̈ob Listra tu'. Yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule tet anma, hac tu' xin yu ishelni anma tu' isnabal, yoc anma isk'ojnocan̈ naj Pablo. Ham yalni anma tato cam naj, yuxin oc anma ishatxacanilto naj yintalto con̈ob.

Yet lahwi yalnicano Comam huntek'an ti' xin, yoc hune' niman bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul Comam, yalni Comam yin̈ caw haban: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, texol ti' ayco hune' mac chinanocojan yul isk'ab camical, ẍi Comam.
Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Caw sunil mac ayicto yalan̈ mule, yuxin macta chiyaco yanma yin̈ tzet chal Comam Jesucristo chischah tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios," ẍiayoj.

Hayet chilahwi yalnic'o ebnaj cawan̈ tu' Istzoti' Comam Dios, ay hune' naj Nok' isbi chiahilo yul hune' niman xab; chaco naj howal yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' cat isk'oji naj yin̈ ebnaj, cat ispotx'lax ebnaj yu naj Nok' isbi tu'. Yanico naj Nok' isbi howal yin̈ ebnaj, chiahilo yul hune' niman xab. Chik'oji naj yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu'
Yuxin ta lin̈anon̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yin̈ tzet jaco yipo janma yet yalan̈tocanoj, ay comajul isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Ta ayxayto Comam Cristo yul heyanma, waxan̈ca cambehal ye henimanil yu mule, wal heyanma xin ay isk'inal mach istan̈bal, yuto xaquexcan c'ulal yul sat Comam.

Ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payxa, caw etalax ebnaj yu ebnaj heyichmam tu', ispotx'laxpaxo ebnaj yu ebnaj. Ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam halnicano tato chihul hune' naj caw toholcano yanma, haxa yet yul hune' naj tu' xin, hesaynican̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ naj yu heyak'nipaxo camoj.

Mach choche yila' tzet ay yet anmahil, chismak'camo yet anmahil, uc'um te', istzann̈etic'a yanico isba xol huntek'an k'in̈ machiswalil, yeb pek' chute isba. Caw xin aytopaxo huntek'an lahan yeb huntek'an ti' chito iswatx'e. Caw xa-tic'a-walan teyet yet yalan̈tocanoj, mac chiuten huntek'an ti', mach chiapni isc'atan̈ Comam Dios.

Wal haninti'an, caw lahaninan haca' issajilk'inal, yuxinto chahweinan yul heyanma yak' isba ay intoc'ojan texol, cat xin wanicojan issajilk'inal ti' yul heyanma yin̈ caw huneln̈e, ẍi Comam. Lahwi yalni Comam tu' xin, isto Comam yebanto isba tet anma.
Comam Jesucristo tu' caw yijem yute isba tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' ismunil ak'lax tet; hacpax tu' naj Mois'es, caw yijem yute isba naj yin̈ ismunil ak'lax xol iscon̈ob Comam Dios.
Yu Cocolomal Jesucristo xin, yak' Comam Dios Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet yin̈ isyaxilal.

Ay hune' naj ti' chiyij Jos'e, yaja' xin Bernab'e occano isbiho naj yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us, yuto hune' bihe Bernab'e, chal yelapnoj Ak'omico Yak'lobal Isc'ul Anma. Naj Bernab'e tu', yuninalto naj jichmam Lev'i ye naj, pitzc'ana naj bey con̈ob Chipre.
Yuxin caw machojab chon̈siquilo cowatx'en sunil isc'ulal, yuto ta mach chon̈pax jintaj caw chi-tic'a-cochah ispaj sunil isc'ulal chicowatx'e.
Wal haninti'an camnajinxalojan yin̈ ley. Ha' hune' ley tu' quinak'ni camojan yun̈e caw witzitzbilojan yin̈ Comam Dios.

Lahwi tu' yak'lax hune' malbal wetan, haca' te' ah. Yallax wetan haca' ti': --Ahan̈wanoj cat hawoc hamalen yatut Comam Dios yebpaxo meẍa yet xahanbal, cat habisni hanta mac ayicto yinoyo isba tet Comam.

Huntek'an ebnaj tu', maẍtic'a hunu ix yik' ebnaj, machi hunu mule iswatx'e ebnaj yeb hunu ix. Caw tzujann̈etic'a ebnaj yinta Comam oc xahanbalil bayxan̈etu'wal ch'ec' Comam. Ebnaj tu' colchalo ebnaj xol anma, yuxin lahan ebnaj haca' babel sat tz'unub chiak'lax tet Comam Dios yeb tet Comam oc xahanbalil.
Huntek'an no' k'ul tu', lahan jilni no' haca' no' cheh istoxa yin̈ howal, ayahto hunun corona naba oro yin̈ iswi' no', lahan xin jilni sat no' yeb anma.
Ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal yuto colbilexxa. Yaja' matolo yu xahechah hecolbanil tu' yuxin chexoc hewatx'e' istx'ojal, ¡machoj! To ischejabxa Comam Dios heyehi.
Yuxin ch'ahilo coc'ul jak'ni jip comunla yin̈ yet Comam Dios, yuto ha' Comam itzitz ayco yipo janma. Ha' Comam tu' Iscolomal sunil anma, yuxin ha' mac chichahni yul yanma, chicolchahi.

Hajxam mac chiyahni Isc'ahol Comam Dios yeb matzet chalilo ischiq'uil Comam yul sat, chinilo ispixan Comam Esp'iritu Santo, Comam chon̈ocheni. Huntek'an mac tu' caw ec'balto isya'tajil chiay yiban̈, yuto ha' ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo t'in̈bancano istrato Comam Dios, con̈yanipaxico yeto Comam.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj hunelxa: --Ayojab ak'anc'ulal texol. Haca' yu walaxtijan yu Inmaman, hac tu' xin chiyu quexwanitojan, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Ha' ebnaj ayco texol tu', ak'omc'ule ebnaj, buchwawompaxo ebnaj. Han̈ech'an yin̈ tzet choche isnimanil ebnaj chaco isnabal. Nime winaj chute isba istzoteli. Caw c'ulch'an chutepaxo istzotel ebnaj tet anma, yaja' cabeb isnabal ebnaj. Hac tu' chute ebnaj yun̈e c'ul ch'ec' yila' ebnaj.

Sunil ebnaj rey yul yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb ebnaj winaj caw ay yelapnoj, yeb ebnaj k'alom, yeb ebnaj yahawil soldado, yeb ebnaj caw aycano yip, yeb ebnaj chejab, yeb ebnaj yet isba ischuquil, yebato isba ebnaj yulaj n̈ach'en yeb yichla ch'en ch'en ay iswi'la witz.

Yaja' wal mac chixiw yanico isba yul ink'aban, yeb mac mach chayto yul yanma win̈an, yeb mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil, yeb macta potx'om anma, yeb macta chiixli yeb chiwinajli, yeb macta chicunn̈en yet anmahil, yeb macta chiay jahno sata tioẍ, yeb sunil macta lek'ti'wom, ha' huntek'an mac tu' chialaxto xol hune' niman k'a' chiah xaj yu azufre, ha' ton iscab camical.
Wal tinan̈ xin, ¿tzet chawechma? Ahan̈wanoj, ahojab ha' hawi'. Aco hawanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo haxinwal chitx'ahlaxcanilo sunil hamul," ẍi naj Anan'ias tu' wetan, ẍi naj Pablo.
Haxa xil iswi' no' lahan jilni haca' xil iswi' ebix ix, haxa yeh no' lahan haca' yeh no' balam.
Yuto hune' ischejab Comam Dios, mach chiyu yanito isba xol howal. Wal xin c'ul chute isba yin̈ sunil anma, helanpaxo iscuywahi, yeb xin niman chute isc'ul.

Waxan̈ca machijinan texol, yaja' ayexico yin̈ inc'ulan, haca'ojtam ayinicojan texol. Caw chintzalahan yet chiwabenan tato caw c'ul hebeybaln̈en tzet choche isc'ul Comam, caw cheyapaxico heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Yuto Comam Dios Jahawil, chitan̈en mac caw c'ul isbeybal, cat xin yabenpaxo Comam istxah. Walpaxo anma machiswalil chiyute isba xin, chiscaj Comam, ẍiayoj.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw xahan ayex yu Comam Jesucristo. Yilal jak'nihan̈ yuch'andiosal teyin̈, yuto yet yalan̈tocanoj quexissic'nilo Comam yun̈e hecolchacano yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo, Comam quexpohnicanilo yeto Comam Dios, yeb yu heyanayto yul heyanma yin̈ isyelal.

Ha' mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal islahabico iswatx'en istx'ojal, haxa mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil xin, islahabico iswatx'en isyahbetajil tu'. Ha' mac chiwatx'en istoholal islahabico iswatx'en istoholal. Ha' mac yetxa Comam Dios yehi islahabico isyijen tzet chal Comam, ẍi naj 'angel.

Istak'wican̈ naj Pedro tet anma haca' ti': --Bejwe hewatx'en istx'ojal, cat yahcano ha' hewi' hununex yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo, cat yak'laxcano nimanc'ulal yin̈ hemul. Hac tu' xin chu hechahnicano Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul heyanma hununex.
Cam cheyil heba, tajca chepajtze tet macta chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈, wal xin ha' heyet aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal teyin̈ hununex, yaj maẍn̈etaj teyin̈, to yin̈paxo sunil anma.

Hacpax tu' ebnaj winaj xaisbejcano ebnaj huntek'an tzet ik'biltic'a yu yin̈ yochen isba yeb yixal, caw chipalc'on ebnaj iswatx'en istx'ojal yin̈ hunun haca' tzet chal yanma, caw xin tx'ixobal tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj yin̈ yet winajil. Ha'tic'a xin isnimanil ebnaj chichahni isya'tajil ispajo istx'ojal chiswatx'e tu'.
Tzalahan̈wepaxo hex ti', ak'we tzalaho hec'ul yin̈ hune' bay chintzalacoti'an.
Yuxin bejwecano istx'ojal. Aweco haba yul isk'ab Comam, cat istan̈tzelaxcanilo hemul. Tato cheyije haca' tu', chihul hune' tiempohal bay chiyak' Comam Dios tzalahilal jet han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti'.
Maẍtic'a chipebalax ispultahil hunun tz'ayic yuto matxa ak'bal bey tu'.
Yuxin macn̈etic'a chic'uxni innimanilti'an, cat yuc'ni inchiq'uilti'an, caw chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Hayet islahobal tz'ayic xin chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an xol anma camom.

Istak'wi Comam tet naj: --Caw machim hawip win̈an tato maẍtaj Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' hawip ti' yul hak'ab. Wal xin, ha' naj quinanicojan yul hak'ab ti', ha' naj caw ec'na ay ismul tasataj, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Yuxin ta ayex cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam, machi xin chewatx'e isc'ulal, nabn̈e cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios. Ha' xin chalniloj ta camomex yul sat Comam.

Yu mule ayco yin̈ conimanil machi yu coyijen isley naj Mois'es, yuxin mach k'oji ley tu' con̈iscolni yalan̈ mule. Yaja' wal Comam Dios yati Comam Isc'ahol yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ha' xin isnimanil Comam Jes'us lahan haca' hune' conimanil yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Iscam Comam yin̈ comul, hac tu' xin yu yak'nicano tan̈o Comam comul yin̈ isnimanil.
Yaj tato cheyabe isya'tajil yu isc'ulal chebeybaln̈e ¡caw sak'al heyet! yuxin mach chexxiw tet hunuxa mac anmahil. Mach cheyak' cabconocan̈ heyanma.
Hex mame mi'e hex ti', mach cheyak'tij ishowal heyuninal yin̈ isnabn̈ehal, haxinwal machi cabconcan̈ isc'ul.

Yalni naj yin̈ caw ip: ¡Maayc'ay niman con̈ob Babilonia, wal tinan̈ maayc'aycanoj! Maoc yatuto ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yeb yehobalo esp'iritu tx'oj, yeb yatuto no' ch'ic caw yahbeta jilni, yeb caw machiswalil.

Chiwalan teyet macta caw lek'ti'wom tu', ha' ton mac chihalni tato Comam Jes'us mach Cristohoj. Ha' ton mac tu' ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam, yuto mach chiyayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yeb yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam.
Yuxin ta ay hunu mac matzet chal yelapno ixim pan tu' yul sat yet chiswahni, yeb yet chuc'ni tzet ayayto yul vaso tu', chaco ismul yin̈ isnimanil Comam Jesucristo, yeb yin̈ ischiq'uil Comam.
¡Tzet hesucal! Cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam, machi xin chebeybaln̈e tzet choche Comam. Ha' xin chalniloj ta machi heyanma yin̈ Comam.

Yuxin hac tu' yu isbey naj Judas tu' issaynoyo Comam. Tzujan xin hun bulan ebnaj soldado yinta naj, yeb huntek'an ebnaj chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios chejlaxti yu ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote. Yetbi ebnaj tu' istah, yeb iscantil, yeb ch'en ch'en chiocnico yin̈ howal.
Wal Comam Dios chij isba sunil tzet chala, ha' Comam chexiptzeni, cat quexiscolni yul isk'ab istx'ojal.

Lahwi tu' xin, yebalaxilo naj yu ismam yeb yu ismi' tu' tet hune' ley ayco yu naj rey tu'. Haxa ix iscutz'in naj rey tu' bey ilchanoti naj nich'an tu', yanico ix naj yuninoj, yak'lax ch'ibo naj yu ix.
Lahwi tu', isnotzen naj 'angel ch'en lesen yu tzak'ak' ayato yiban̈ meẍa, isk'ojnayti naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'; yin̈n̈ena tu' xin isbili c'uh, isn̈irlahi isjepla c'uh yec'paxo chixcab.

Yuto sunilej con̈ob xaayc'ay yin̈ mule yu istx'ojal hune' con̈ob tu', haca'tan̈e caw xaiscamtzecanilo iswi' huntek'an con̈ob tu' yu istx'ojal. Haxa ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xaayc'ay ebnaj yin̈ ixlo yu hune' con̈ob tu'. Sunil ebnaj txon̈wom ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', xaoc ebnaj k'alomal yu istxon̈ni tzettaj ye tu' caw ay istohol, yuto hune' con̈ob tu' caw lolo' isk'aptzen isba yeb yec'tzen k'in̈, ẍi naj 'angel tu'.
Yu ton hune' tu', yuxin quinistzabayojan ebnaj Israel yul yatut Comam Dios, quinyanicojan ebnaj preso, caw xin yoche ebnaj quinispotx'o'an.
Anma tu' chismajche istxiquin yin̈ cuybanile yel chala, yin̈xan̈e xin comon ic'ti' bay chaco yanma anma tu'.

Yaja' ayexto hex ti', maẍto cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an, ẍi Comam. Yal Comam haca' tu' yuto caw yohtaxa Comam yet caw yalan̈tocanoj macta mach chianayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal Comam. Caw xin yohtaxapaxo Comam mac chianico yul isk'ab ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈.

Istak'wi Comam tet naj: --Ha' mac bay chiwak'atojan ixim pan chinlabahan, ha' hune' tu', ẍi Comam tet naj. Lahwi tu' xin islaban Comam ixim pan tu', yak'ni Comam ixim tet naj Judas Iscariote, isc'ahol icham Sim'on.

Hach Timoteo, caw chawil haba yin̈ tzet abebilico yul hak'ab. Mach chawabeto huntek'an tx'oj tzoti' machi nino isc'ulal chak'a. Mach chawabepaxto huntek'an helanile maẍtaj yecoj chal ebnaj chon̈cajni yu chijalic'o isyelal.

Yaj wal hunmajanxa ebnaj Israel mach yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal naj Pablo, caw tit ishowal ebnaj yuto caw tx'i'al anma yaco isba yin̈ tzet yal naj Pablo tu'. Iscutxbanico ebnaj huntek'an ebnaj caw isa, ton̈e chi'ec' yul calle, caw mach-tic'a-iswalil. Ha' ebnaj tu' xin oc ak'oc'ule tet ebnaj yul con̈ob tu' yun̈e yah wejna ebnaj sunil. Yipicto ebnaj yul yatut hune' naj chiyij Jas'on yu chisna ebnaj tato ha' tu' ay naj Pablo yeb naj Silas, yuto caw choche ebnaj istzabayo ebnaj cawan̈ tu' cat yalaxico ebnaj yul isk'ab con̈ob.

Tato chijila ta ay hunu juẍta ayco yin̈ mule, yaj mule mach chon̈yito yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal, cok'anawe isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈ naj, cat xin yak'ni Comam iscawil naj. Wal xin ay hune'xa mule chon̈inito yul isk'ab hune' camical mach istan̈bal. Tato yin̈ hune' mule tu' bay ayco juẍtaj maca janab, caw chiwalan teyet mach chek'an isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈, mach chiwalan teyet ta chextxahli yin̈.
Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, macn̈etic'a chichahni hunu inchejaban, haninan chinischahpaxojan. Hacpax tu' xin macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan, chischahpaxo Mac chejn̈eintijan, ẍi Comam.

Hac tu' tzet ak'bil jet yu Comam Dios, hune' yet joc yul isk'ab, mach chu ishec'laxi. Yuxin jak'awe yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tu', cat jinayo coba tet Comam yin̈ sunil janma, haca' caw choche Comam. Xiwojon̈wepaxo tet Comam.

Aypaxo xin huntek'an ebnaj Israel chiec' bey tu' chiel ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yu ebnaj. Yak'len ebnaj yawten isbi Comam Jes'us yu yinilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma. Yalni ebnaj haca' ti': --Yin̈ isbi naj Jes'us, naj chiec' naj Pablo yalac'o istzoti', chijalan̈ elan̈wej, ẍi ebnaj.
Wal naj Pablo xin, haxa naj Silas yito naj. Caw tak'elaxcano ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios yu ebnaj juẍta ay bey tu', tzujan tu' xin isto ebnaj.
Caw nann̈e heyu xin, tajca caw nabn̈e cheyu yin̈ hemunil yin̈ yet Comam. Wal xin caw tz'ajanojab chu hechahni ispaj selel hemunil tet Comam Dios.

Aypaxo yip ebnaj ismajchen satcan̈ yun̈e matxa chak' ha' n̈ab yulbal tz'ayic bay chal ebnaj Istzoti' Comam. Aypaxo yip ebnaj yanico ha ha' chic'al, yebpaxo xin ay yip ebnaj yak'ni ec'oya' yanma anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yu ej isya'tajil, hantatic'a el choche isc'ul ebnaj.
Caw mach chu hawoc yin̈ hune' tzet chijuti'an̈, yuto ha' ismachiswalil chi'ec' yul hawanma yul sat Comam Dios.
Macta chiwalan wetojan, caw hawetpaxoj, yeb xin macta caw hawet, wetpaxojan, yin̈ xin chiilchalo sunil wipan.
Sunil mac chic'ayic'oj, sunil mac xayetato isba. Machi hunu mac chiwatx'en isc'ulal nitam hunuj.
Mach chisje ta nime winaj cheyute heba cat helolo'n̈en heba yet chewatx'en hunu tzet ye tu', wal xin chewla winaj cheyute heba. Ec'balojab yelapno ebnaj juẍta teyiban̈ cheyabe.

Xolbal hujeb candelero tu' wilan hune' mac haca' anma jilni. Caw nimajal ishojayo istel xil isk'ap ayicoj, masanta chiayilo yin̈ yoj. Aypaxico hune' iscincho naba oro, nimajal ispak'i sat chiah apno istxam isc'ul.
Sunil tzettaj ay bey tu' matxa chiay ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈. Yul hune' con̈ob tu' ay istz'on̈obal Comam Dios yeb Comam oc xahanbalil. Sunil ischejab Comam xin chiyiyo isba tet,
Lan̈anxa yul istiempohal bay chitan̈ilo sunil tzet ye tu', yuxin helanojab cheyute heba, itz'atn̈eojab henani hetxahli.

Ha' bey tu' xin, oc ebnaj yul hune' te' barco, ismeltzo ebnaj yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia hunelxa, bay tak'elaxto ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios yu ebnaj juẍtaj yet yichico ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios yulajla con̈ob; wal xin yijcano isba hune' ismunil ebnaj tu'.

Tato ayex chexmohyi, mach muleho hune' tu'; taca hunu ix k'opo chimohyi xin, mach tx'ojopaxo hune' tu'. Yaja' wal mac chimohyi caw ay isya'tajil chila. Ay wala'an mach chak'le huntek'an isya'tajil tu'.

Maẍtaj yeb anma chijak' howal, wal xin lan̈an jak'ni howal yin̈ yesp'iritu naj matzwalil chiec' satcan̈ xol jak'ek'. Huntek'an esp'iritu tu' caw ay yip yeb chon̈ischej cowatx'en istx'ojal, yeb yahaw yeco yin̈ istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Tato ay hunujex maẍto tz'ajano hehelanil, k'anwe tet Comam Dios, cat yak'ni Comam teyet, yuto mach chismale Comam yak'ni tet macta chik'anni. Chak' Comam tet, yaj mach chalico Comam yin̈ sat mac bay chak' Comam hune' tu'.
Mach cheyilo yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul heyanma.

Hune' yatut Comam tu', hac ti' yehi: Cabeb cuarto yul, pohbilayo yu hune' k'ap k'ap litx'ancan̈ yictabal. Hune' babel cuarto chihallax Txahulal, ha' tu' ayicto ch'en l'ampara yeb te' meẍa, yeb ixim pan chihaltelax tet Comam Dios.

Wal xin chiwalan teyet lok'we heoro wetan, ch'en caw c'ul watx'ebilxalo xol k'a k'a'. Hac tu' xin chexoc k'alomal yin̈ caw isyelal, cat xin helok'ni xil hek'ap caw sajhopon̈e wetan, cat heyanico teyin̈ yun̈e mach chiel hetx'ixobal yuto t'ilanex. Chelok'nipaxo yan̈al isbak' hesat wetan yun̈e chu heyilni.
Hex chahbilxa Isc'ahol Comam heyu, chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet yun̈e heyohtan̈eniloj tato ay hek'inal mach istan̈bal.

Macn̈etic'a yul iswi' chiyiti tzet chiyak' iscuyu' anma, chiyute hune' tu' yun̈e yoc iswinajil sata anma. Wal hanin chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios, ha' yalaxico ismay Comam yu anma ha' chinsayan, yuxin caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalti'an, caw machi lek'ti'al yin̈.
Haca' hunu k'alomal ayayto yul hunu tx'otx' xi, hac tu' ye Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ conimanil, yun̈e isyenilo isba ta ha' Istzoti' Comam caw aycano yip; yin̈ Comam Dios chitita, mach jetojan̈ yehi.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuhan, machojab cheyak' istx'ojal ispaj selel tet mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈, wal xin awecano yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ha' Comam chiak'ni ispaj selel tet mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal tu'. Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios: "Haninn̈ehan chu wanayojan isya'tajil yiban̈ mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal, haninn̈ehan chu inpajtzenan," ẍi Comam Dios Jahawil, ẍiayoj.
Yuxinto yalpaxo Comam tet ebnaj: --Tato han-caw-inan chiwican̈ inbahan, caw matzet chalilo hune' tu', yaj wal xin ha' caw Inmaman chianico inmayan. Ha' Inmamtu'an xin, ha' cheyal heDiosaloj.

Machojab cheyak' etaxoto ismunil Comam Dios yu tzet chelo. Yin̈ caw isyelal sunil tzet chilolaxi mach istx'ojal ayco yin̈. Ha' istx'ojal, ha' coloni hunu tzet ye tu' chiak'ni cabconocan̈ yanma hunu mac yin̈ Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, yinito ebnaj isnimanil Comam, ispichnico ebnaj k'ap yeb an̈ caw xuk' sam tu' yin̈ isnimanil Comam; yuto hac tu' chiyute anma Israel yin̈ iscamom yet chimujlaxi.

Caw tz'aypaxo hec'ul yin̈ ebnaj alaxicto yul preso, machi xin oc bisc'ulal yin̈ hec'ul yet yilaxilo tzet ayex yuto heyohtaj ta ec'balto isc'ulal chiak'lax teyet yul satcan̈, huntek'an machi bak'inal chilahwi.
Yaj xin ay hune' naj, titna yin̈ yuninal naj rey David tu', Jes'us isbi. Ha' Comam Jes'us ti' yati Comam Dios yun̈e iscolcha sunil jet Israel ti', haca' yu yalnicano Comam yet yalan̈tocanoj.

Wal xin tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Ay huntek'an tzet watx'ebilxa yu Comam Dios tet mac chiochen Comam. Hune' tu' maẍto hunu mac xailni, yeb xaabeni, maẍtopaxo mac xaec' isnabal yin̈, ẍiayoj.
Tato ayco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios teyin̈, Comam pitzc'ancan̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom, ha' Comam chiak'ni hune' ac' nimanile tet henimanil cambehal yehi yu Yesp'iritu ayco teyin̈.
Ha'tic'a Comam Esp'iritu Santo chalni tet janma tato yuninalxa Comam Dios jehi.
Mach cheyak' subchaho heba, yuto machi hunu mac chu yetlico yin̈ Comam Dios. Ha' tzet chicotz'unu, ha' chicohatx'paxoj.

Txumweloj tato caw c'ulch'an isc'ul Comam, yaja' xin caw howpaxoj. Caw yiti Comam ishowal yin̈ ebnaj yetato isba, wal teyin̈ xin caw c'ulch'an yute isc'ul Comam, yaja' tan̈e yin̈n̈e isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam chelahico iscawxi hec'ul, ta mach xin ha' hunex chextzoc'laxiltoj.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, niman cheyute hec'ul masanto yet chul Comam Jesucristo, haca' chu hunu naj munlawom niman isc'ul naj yechman yoc ha' n̈ab. Nimanpaxo chute isc'ul naj yechman yelilo sat istz'unub.

Ha'ojab Comam Dios chianayo isc'ulal yiban̈ macta ay bey yatut juẍta Ones'iforo, yuto tx'i'al el hulic'o naj yak'a' isnimanbal inc'ulan. Waxan̈ca ayinictijan yul preso ti' yaj xin mach chitx'ixwilo naj win̈an.
Tinan̈ xin hex caw xahan ay wuti'an, caw huneln̈ehojab jeco yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yun̈e mach chon̈xiw tet Comam yet chihul hunelxa yeb mach chon̈tx'ixwican̈.
Chiwalan teyet hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, beybaln̈ewe haca' tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu. Mach cheyak' yub istx'ojal choche henimanil.

Hune' chiwalti'an caw yelcanoj. Sunil anma yilal yanayto yul yanma tato hulic'o Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e iscolnicanilo sunil anma mulum. Xol sunil huntek'an anma mulum tu', haninti'an ec'bal mulum inan.
Wal tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, yik'ab yip heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuto caw aycano ishelanil yip Comam.
Yuxin ha' mac caw c'ul yeco chabe, yilal caw cam chil isba haxinwal mach chiayc'ayi.
Yuto hune'n̈e xahanbal yak' Comam con̈yanico yin̈ istoholal yin̈ huneln̈e han̈on̈ yeton̈xa Comam ti'.
Hac tu' yu istzabnipaxico ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' issic'nican̈ isch'en yun̈e isk'ojni camo ebnaj Comam yalni.

Chiwochehan cheyohtan̈eloj ta Comam Jesucristo, ha' caw ayco iswi'ehalo ebnaj winaj. Haxa naj ichamile xin, iswi'ehal yeco naj yin̈ yixal, haca'paxo Comam Dios iswi'ehal yeco Comam yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Ay ebnaj ec'ya' isbahlaxi ishatelaxpaxoj, ay ebnaj c'albalax yu ch'en cadena, ay ebnaj alaxicto yul preso.

Ha' tzet ayco yipo janma tu', ha' chon̈lin̈bani cat yak'ni ist'in̈anil janma, haca' chu islin̈ban ch'en ancla te' barco yiban̈ ha' mar. Hune' iscawxobal coc'ul xaapni sata Comam Dios haca' ta xak'axponic'to yinta k'ap k'ap aycan̈ yictabal yatut Comam Dios bey satcan̈.

Mach cheyato heba xol huntek'an tzet chiswatx'e anma xolto k'ejholo ayco yanma, yuto ha' huntek'an tzet chiswatx'e anma tu', caw machi nich'ano isc'ulal. Wal xin halwe tet cat heyenilo tet ta machi nich'ano c'ulu tzet chiswatx'e tu'.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, mach cheyalle hek'umal hunujex, yuto ta ay mac chihalni isk'umal yuẍtaj maca yanab, lan̈an yalni isk'umal chejbanile yet Comam Dios. Maca ta cheyala ta mach c'ulo yeco hunu heyuẍtaj maca heyanab, lan̈an heyalni tato chejbanile yet Comam mach c'uloj. Hac tu' xin lan̈an heyanico heba juezal yin̈ chejbanile yet Comam tu', mach xin lan̈ano heyijeni.

Cablahon̈eb ispultahil isc'ubal con̈ob tu', ha' ton cablahon̈eb ch'en perla, hunun pulta tu' hunun ch'en perla ayco yin̈. Wal hune' niman calle chiec'to yictabal con̈ob tu' naba oron̈e, chik'axpon cosat yul haca' vidrio.

Wal Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi, caw yijem yin̈ ismunil yul yatut Comam Dios. Hune' yatut Comam tu' xin ha' ton han̈on̈ ti', yaja' ta t'in̈an iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ tzet ayco yipo janma yin̈ caw tzalahilal.
Xahanojab cheyil heba hununex, yaja' yin̈ sunil heyanma. Yahwecano sunilal istx'ojal cat helahnico hewatx'en sunil isc'ulal.

Yin̈ena tu' yec' hune' niman chixcab istan̈ilo hune' islahon̈eb majan te' n̈a yul hune' niman con̈ob tu', hujeb mil anma cam yu hune' chixcab tu'. Wal anma mach cami caw xiwi, yanico ismay Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈.
Yaja' matxa yilalo ay hunuxa mac chioc xolbal, yuto hune'xan̈e mac yak'cano istrato, ha' ton Comam Dios.
Yuxinto yal naj tet Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ yuxinto mach chaẍtak'wi wetan? ¿Tom mach hawohtajoj tato ay wipan cachinbejtzonan, maca xin cachwanican̈an yin̈ culus? ẍi naj tet Comam.

Hac ti' chute yalni te' Hum bay lan̈an yilni naj: Haca' hunu no' me' chiilaxto camoj, hac tu' chiyu yilaxotoj. Haca' chu hunu no' nich'an me' matzet chala yet chiilaxilo xil, hac tu' chiyute' isba, machi huno tzoti' chiahti yul isti'.

Tzujan tu' xin, isk'anni ebnaj jichmam hune' isreyal tet Comam Dios yun̈e istan̈elax ebnaj. Hac tu' xin yu yoc naj Sa'ul isreyalo ebnaj yin̈ cawina habil. Isc'ahol hune' naj chiyij Cis ye naj, isc'ahol yuninal icham Benjam'in.

Wal xin ay ebnaj mach chischah yabe' istoholal cuybanile, han̈e huntek'an tzoti' matzet chal yelapno chal ebnaj, cat yak'ni subchaho ebnaj anma, ha' ton ebnaj xin chalni ta yilal yak'lax circuncidar macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam.
Yul hune' s'abana tu', ayayto sunil no nok'; no' can̈eb yoj, no' chishatxic'o isc'ul, yeb no' ch'ic.
Ha' isc'ulch'anil hawak' wetan xawak'paxojan tet ebnaj tu', yun̈e caw lahanxan̈e chiyucano isnabal haca'tic'a je han̈on̈ ti'.

Huntek'an cuybanile ak'bil tawet wuhan, yin̈ caw yeli yet Comam Dios yehi. Ha' huntek'an cuybanile ti' chawilto habeybaln̈eni. Tinan̈ hunxan̈e je yeb Comam Jesucristo, yuxin aco hawanma yin̈ Comam, yeb xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil.

Ha' bey tu' xin ayayo wajeb nimeta ch'en moc tz'ahab. Aymi oxebo maca can̈ebo nimeta tz'ahab ha' chiayto yul hunun. Yul huntek'an moc tu' chiayto ha ha' chiocnico yu ebnaj Israel istx'ahni isk'ab haca' yalni ischejbanil ebnaj.
Nachaojabilo heyu yin̈ istx'ojal bay ayexicoj yeb matxa cheyaco hemul, yuto ayex maẍto heyohtajo Comam Dios. Chiwalan hune' ti' yun̈e hetx'ixwican̈.
Chewojab cheyute heba, c'ulch'anojab cheyute hec'ul. Xahanojab cheyil heba, niman cheyute hec'ul teyin̈ hununex, ayojab henimanc'ulal.

Yebpaxo anma haca'tan̈e ayxato xol k'a k'a', tzacweltij, hac tu' chu hecolni xol k'a'. Caw yilal istz'ay hec'ul yin̈ anma, yaja' nann̈eojab heyu yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e yuto ay ismay heyetaxto yu. Yahwe huntek'an istx'ojal chiswatx'e tu', haca' chiyu coyahni hunu xilk'ape bacbilico yal tx'ac yin̈.
Johtaj tato sunil tzet ye tu' chihul jiban̈ han̈on̈ chijoche Comam Dios, to yu isc'ulal jin̈ yuxin chul jiban̈ han̈on̈ awtebilon̈xa yu Comam yun̈e yijni isba tzet choche Comam jin̈.
Caw sunil mac ohtan̈e tato caw yijemex, yuxin caw chintzalahan teyin̈. Chiwochehan ta helan cheyute heba yin̈ isc'ulal, maẍtaj yin̈ istx'ojal.

Ha' bey tu' ay hune' altar naba oro bay chin̈uslax pom, yulicto cuarto tu' aypaxicto te' caẍa yet istrato Comam Dios, sunil yin̈ te' ayco ch'en oro. Yul te' caẍa tu' ayayto hune' ẍalu naba oro bay ayayto man'a, aypaxayto isk'ojoch naj Aar'on, hune' te' k'ojoch elilo iswol; aypaxayto ch'en ch'en pak'an yehi bay tz'ibn̈ebiloco ley.
Ta hac tu' chal tu', ¿tzettaxca xin chielico hune' helolo'al? Chitan̈canoj yuto maẍtaj yu coyijen isley naj Mois'es yuxin chon̈colchahi, walxinto yu janico janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.

¿Tom caw maẍto chawayto yul hawanma tato wetbi inbahan yeb Inmaman, yetbipaxo Inmaman wehan? Yuxinto sunil tzet chiwalan teyet mach wetojan inchuquilan, ha' Inmaman ayico wetbihojan, ha' chiwatx'en ismunil.
Lahwi tu' xin yah bulna anma yin̈ naj Pablo yeb naj Silas. Ischejni ebnaj yahaw con̈ob tu' istzillaxilo xil isk'ap ebnaj yun̈e ishatelax ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yu te' hitx'om c'ax.
Chiwak'canojan hune' ac' chejbanile ti' teyet, xahan cheyil heba hununex. Haca' isxahanil ayex wuhan, hac tu' cheyutepaxo heba.

Hune' conimanil ti', lahan haca' hune' nich'an leẍpat chietaxtoj. Yaja' johtaj ta ay hune' nimanile caw c'ul watx'ebil yu Comam Dios yul satcan̈, mach anmaho watx'en̈e, yeb xin machi bak'inal chitan̈iloj.
Yalni Comam Jes'us yin̈ ip tet anma: --Ha' mac chinchahnaytojan yul yanma, maẍn̈etajinan chinischahan, to ha' hun Inmaman chischahpaxoj, yuto ha' quinanitijan.
Yalni naj Anan'ias hac ti': --Mamin, yaj tx'i'al tzet xawabehan yin̈ naj Saulo tu'. Caw hanta anma ayco yul hak'ab bey Jerusal'en, caw ch'ec'ya' yanma yu naj.

Ay anma ti' ha'n̈ech'an chisxahann̈e isba. Chanico yanma yin̈ ch'en melyu, chislolo'n̈en isba cat yinipaxocan̈ isba, cat yoc yalno tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios. Matxa chisyije tzet chal ismam ismi'. Matxa chiyak' yuch'andiosal yin̈ tzet chiak'lax tet, matxa tzet chalilo cuybanile yet Comam Dios yul sat.
Tinan̈ xin c'ulon̈xa yul sat Comam Dios yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo, yuxin yin̈ sunil janma chijala tato ha' Comam chon̈colni yin̈ isya'tajil chul yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic.

Haninti'an caw wohtajan tato machi hunu tzet chilolax ti' ayco istx'ojal yin̈, caw t'in̈an wehan yin̈ hune' ti' yuto yuninalxa Comam Jesucristo wehan. Yaja' tato ay hunu mac chitxumni tato ayco istx'ojal yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu', tx'oj isloni chal tu'.

Tato chacuycanto ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yin̈ huntek'an ti', c'ulach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo chal tu', lan̈an hach'ib yin̈ caw c'ul yin̈ tzet chu janico janma yin̈ Comam, yeb yin̈ cuybanile caw c'ul chi-tic'a-hayije.
